createContentPane

public java.awt.Container createContentPane()
Create components and add them to a Container which is then returned to caller

Returns:
Container Container holding filelists and arrowbuttons

populateRemoteList

public void populateRemoteList(org.apache.commons.net.ftp.FTPFile[] files)
Take array of FTPFiles and add them to remote list and also to a map that maps the files to its index in the list. This to make it possible to retrieve file selected in list

Parameters:
files - List of files to add to remote list component

populateLocalList

public void populateLocalList(java.io.File[] files)
Take array of Files and add them to remote list and also to a map that maps the files to its index in the list. This to make it possible to retrieve file selected in list

Parameters:
files - List of files to add to local list component
